Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose System for In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Berichrom Heparin UF Calibrator and Controls for quantitative measurement of unfractionated heparin in vitro
Indications for Use Summary: Calibrator is used for calibration of the Berichrom Heparin assay for measurement of unfractionated heparin; Controls are low and high level assayed materials for assessment of precision and analytical bias in quantitative determination of unfractionated heparin with the Berichrom Heparin assay
